register.name: ERRIDR
register.description: Defines the number of error records that can be accessed through the Error Record system registers.

register.name: ERRSELR
register.description: Selects an error record to be accessed through the Error Record system registers.

register.name: ERXFR
register.description: Accesses bits[31:0] of the ERR<n>FR feature register for the error record selected by ERRSELR.SEL.

register.name: ERXCTLR
register.description: Accesses bits[31:0] of the ERR<n>CTLR control register for the error record selected by ERRSELR.SEL.

register.name: ERXSTATUS
register.gui_name: Selected Error Record Primary Status Register
register.description: Accesses bits[31:0] of the ERR<n>STATUS primary status register for the error record selected by ERRSELR.SEL.

register.name: ERXADDR
register.description: Accesses bits[31:0] of the ERR<n>ADDR address register for the error record selected by ERRSELR.SEL.

register.name: ERXFR2
register.description: Accesses bits[63:32] of the ERR<n>FR feature register for the error record selected by ERRSELR.SEL.

register.name: ERXCTLR2
register.description: Accesses bits[63:32] of the ERR<n>CTLR control register for the error record selected by ERRSELR.SEL.

register.name: ERXADDR2
register.description: Accesses bits[63:32] of the ERR<n>ADDR address register for the error record selected by ERRSELR.SEL.

register.name: ERXMISC0
register.description: Accesses bits[31:0] of the ERR<n>MISC0 miscellaneous register 0 for the error record selected by ERRSELR.SEL.

register.name: ERXMISC1
register.description: Accesses bits[63:32] of the ERR<n>MISC0 miscellaneous register 0 for the error record selected by ERRSELR.SEL.

register.name: ERXMISC2
register.description: Accesses bits[31:0] of the ERR<n>MISC1 miscellaneous register 1 for the error record selected by ERRSELR.SEL.

register.name: ERXMISC3
register.description: Accesses bits[63:32] of the ERR<n>MISC1 miscellaneous register 1 for the error record selected by ERRSELR.SEL.

register.name: DISR
register.description: Records that an SError interrupt has been consumed by an ESB instruction.

register.name: VDFSR
register.description: Provides the syndrome value reported to software in DFSR.{AET, ExT} on taking a virtual SError interrupt exception. The remainder of the DFSR is set as defined by VMSAv8-32.

register.name: VDISR
register.description: Records that a virtual SError interrupt has been consumed by an ESB instruction executed at Non-secure EL1.
